location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche, Council of Bussora (Basra) at Bushire from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports that through Shaikh Sadoon an agreement has been made with Carim Cahn [Karim Khan] that he shall purchase three or four lachs of rupees of cloth and perpets per annum. Other trade and financial matters are discussed.
